reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt fits true to size and appreciate its layer quality, with one mentioning it works well as a layer under a raincoat. They describe it as stylish. While some customers find it warm, others note it's not super warm, and several mention it's a bit pricey.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love the material and the upscale look
items.body: Love this jacket! Great material - a great compromise between a sweater and a jacket. Very classy looking - a bit more upscale than my other Columbia jackets. Fits true to size (5'6" and 125 lbs) the small works perfectly for me. It is a bit fitted and the material is perfect for a fall or spring jacket. I love everything about this jacket - a bit pricy but I can't complain because I like it so much. My husband has an expensive Patagonia jacket of the same type of material that cost twice as much as this Columbia. This will be a go-to for many months. Read more
items.author: Mardi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A level up from the usual fleece.
items.body: I haven’t worn it yet, but it’s exactly what I was looking for, and it fits how I wanted it to. With the sweater knit on the outside, it’s a level up from the usual fleece. I’m 4’11, 130 lbs. It’s somewhat fitted, but has enough room for a couple layers under it, and will be a good layer under a rain coat. As expected, it’s a bit long, but just over the bum. Read more
items.author: DJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm
items.body: Very very warm and stylish. I received the lighter color but kept it anyway as I needed it for a trip. Read more
items.author: soniab

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the jacket.
items.body: I love the sweater fleece jackets and this is the best one I’ve had so far! Definitely worth the purchase. Read more
items.author: Page

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Jacket, A Little Pricey
items.body: I really like this jacket. It’s slightly fitted, and very comfortable. It’s not the fluffy soft fleece fabric like I’ve gotten in the past with this brands jackets, but kind of a knit fabric that looks a little more classy. It is well made and fits me perfectly. I thought the price was a little on the high side, but otherwise I’m pleased with it. Read more
items.author: firecat13

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice layer
items.body: The jacket is comfortable and flattering. Not super warm but a good layer. Nice zipper and pockets. Read more
items.author: Maryb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars April
items.body: Good quality. Warm very nice Read more
items.author: April M. Bungy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for when you need a little more professional look than fleece
items.body: Cute sweater jacket. I keep it in my office and switch to it from my blazer when the AC gets chilly. I love that it looks a little more dressy than just a fleece jacket. Sizing is spot on as always with Columbia. Read more
items.author: 3BoyMom

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Chalk Heather, Shale Purple Heather, Rich Wine Heather, Moonvista/Fig Heather. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
